website_summaries.verdict: If beer isn't your thing, but you still want to try home brewing, here's a simple kit to transform a bottle of generic vodka into an exquisitely flavored bottle of gin.
pros: Comes with everything you need, other than a bottle of vodka
Other spice and flavoring blends are available
cons: Somewhat expensive for what you get: a funnel, a strainer, two bottles, and small packets of necessary ingredients to transform one bottle of vodka into gin

customer_reviews.title: Make your own gin and drink it. What's not to like?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit in the past and I was so satisfied with the results that I bought 2 this year. The gin came out delicious and my friends and I enjoyed it very much. I love this gin kit and I definitely will buy it again. It's so awesome to make your own gin. I even bought the refill packs that offer different flavors too. Can't wait to see how good those come out. Looking forward to it. If you like gin then I would definitely recommend the homemade gin kit.
customer_reviews.author: Reub

customer_reviews.title: and my wife stole it from my family - which was awesome. She made it and we're thrilled with the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a white elephant gift exchange...and my wife stole it from my family - which was awesome. She made it and we're thrilled with the results! We have already gone through half of the gin she made - really, we don't have a problem ;) as it's both fine for sipping as well as mixing with some of our typical gin cocktails. We're looking forward to making another batch - I am curious to find out if they have additional botanical blends they may use in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Mixed review
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Christmas last year. He loves spirits. He was very excited to make this kit. He followed the directions and was disappointed. Did not have great flavor. He is kind of a gin snob so maybe this was not for him. The idea was great and everything was easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer G

customer_reviews.title: Fun project, mediocre gin
customer_reviews.text: The kit itself is a very cool thing. I got it as a Valentine’s gift for my husband, and he loved it. It also came VERY quickly, which I wasn’t expecting! The resulting gin is... interesting. It’s not terrible, but it’s very floral. I would probably enjoy it in the spring mixed with lemonade. All and all I would recommend it to someone who likes projects. We’ll probably try this again with different berries and stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Roseberry

customer_reviews.title: Easy to make, fun gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend a while back. His family are big G&T drinkers and thought it would be a fun gift! My advice is don’t skimp on the vodka — we went with Kettle One and it came out good. Color is a light amber from the spices. Tastes like gin! We bought this again for his parents this past Christmas and they had fun making it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product, taste may vary
customer_reviews.text: It was a good idea but we will need to work with different spirits. It recommended not using a top shelf spirit because it wouldn’t be needed. We didn’t get a “gin” flavor from products provided but it may be a ratio issue and something we need to work on. Next time we will use a better grade spirit and work on ratio. Over all very nice. Boyfriend likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved this as his Christmas gift. We had realistic expectations. We didn't expect to make Hendricks quality Gin. He used all the juniper and herbs and it wasn't quite our type of gin but it was so much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Ivette

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for a Guy
customer_reviews.text: My husband LOVED this gift but I gave it a 4 star because it was short-lived. He loved using it to make the Gin product but for the $$$, the gift did not last long.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Great introductory to Gin making. The kit offers two bottles, screen, funnel, and botanicals. Its a great starter for anyone interested in mixing and creating their own Gin. We made two styles with grapefruit and one with lemon. This kit is great for a gift, mother's day, recent grad...all occasions really.
customer_reviews.author: GrandVizier

customer_reviews.title: ridiculous
customer_reviews.text: To spend this money on two bottles and some juniper berries is ridiculous Rather than buying vodka to make gin save your money and buy quality gin bespoke or commercial. There is no value in this product and I feel like an idiot in having bought it I am checking on a return
customer_reviews.author: David burmon

customer_reviews.title: Cute box
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t tasted it yet but it was a great anniversary first for husband.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Doucet

customer_reviews.title: Kit is amazing but the equipment that comes withome it like the ...
customer_reviews.text: Kit is amazing but the equipment that comes withome it like the strainer and the funnel are not that great, the craftsmanship of it is so poor. The strainer has some of the wire mesh sticking out and the funnel have some plasma or welding spots that is not refined.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Denina

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price.
customer_reviews.text: I love the flavor and the convenience. Don’t however, follow all the directions when it comes to the vodka chosen. Bad vodka yields bad gin. Top shelf is not needed, but upgrade beyond the cheapest available.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Great Fathers Day/birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: Great DIY gift!! Gives you all the ingredients necessary! Very fun to do with family! Very easy process and the gin tastes fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend as a gift.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, just awesome. I ordered this as a Christmas gift for my dad and it’s really easy to make. Clear and easy to follow instructions and it can’t with everything you need to make him (except the vodka).
customer_reviews.author: I_Am_Karma

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Got it for a friend, it doesn't so much as make Gin, rather murky flavored vodka. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kavita

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Packaging for Present
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my dad. He enjoys beer brewing, but has never infused his own hard alcohol before. The packaging is great for those who want to give this as a gift, and he is excited to use this!
customer_reviews.author: Eva Gray

customer_reviews.title: Let's make Gin!!
customer_reviews.text: Hasn't been used yet, but got a smile out of my husband on Christmas morning. A rare fete'!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Maas

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Made really odd tasting gin. We chilled it in the freezer and swilled it anyway. A novelty.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: however that something tasted HORRIBLE! Maybe with top shelf vodka to start it ...
customer_reviews.text: This kit definitely turned vodka into something... however that something tasted HORRIBLE! Maybe with top shelf vodka to start it would work better. the kit is a cool idea though
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: and he really liked it. It is packaged very nicely
customer_reviews.text: We gave this as a gift to our friend, and he really liked it. It is packaged very nicely, and all of the individual materials (glass bottles, juniper berries, etc.) appear to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: AshC

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Comes with a really cute card explaining ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Comes with a really cute card explaining how to use it! The only reason I give it 4 stars is because the packaging wasn't secure and the glass bottles became loose and we're free floating in the box! Luckily no damage!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Muromoto

customer_reviews.title: The product itself is great and will make the perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: The original arrived broken but was replaced within 2 days by the seller. The product itself is great and will make the perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This kit is so cool! I bought it as a gift and the ...
customer_reviews.text: This kit is so cool! I bought it as a gift and the recipient loved it! Keep in mind that you are required to buy a bottle of vodka that (obviously) does not come with this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Bri  V

customer_reviews.title: Very useful, and great quality
customer_reviews.text: The first one showed up shattered, but I was refunded and sent a new kit. Very useful, and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Unique gift find!
customer_reviews.text: I saw this as a gift idea in a newsletter, and they were selling it for almost twice the cost AND were sold out. I got this as a present for my SO for Christmas, and he loved it. It's a unique, fun gift that's great for anyone who loves gin martinis.
customer_reviews.author: brooke roberts

customer_reviews.title: ... to get the flavor right but it has been fun.
customer_reviews.text: We can't seem to get the flavor right but it has been fun.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: it is a good introduction to the concept of steeping vodkas
customer_reviews.text: Solid starter kit for home-making gin. The price is a bit steep considering you are essentially purchasing a funnel, a strainer, and two 375 mL flasks. That said, it is a good introduction to the concept of steeping vodkas, and the blend that comes with the kit makes a tasty product.
customer_reviews.author: David Korasick

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy, but quite juniper-y
customer_reviews.text: The gin was fun and easy to make but was quite heavy on the juniper
customer_reviews.author: K. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Cool experience to make your own gin
customer_reviews.text: Cool experience to make your own gin. Easy to use and we were able to make some great homemade gin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and the gin was easy to make
customer_reviews.text: The kit was functional, and the gin was easy to make. The botanical taste, however, was a bit too strong for me.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID SIMONI

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, my husband is having a blast with it.
customer_reviews.author: Huxley

customer_reviews.title: ... as a gift for my older brother and he loved it he wasn't expecting it at
customer_reviews.text: meant as a gift for my older brother and he loved it he wasn't expecting it at all
customer_reviews.author: Juan santoyo

customer_reviews.title: ) awesome kit. Nice package / of goodies
customer_reviews.text: QUICK delivery! :) awesome kit. Nice package / of goodies! very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: rms

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty great gift. Loved the gin, and can get refills to make more!
customer_reviews.author: Kathie W

customer_reviews.title: This is a great Kit. Lots of fun as there are so ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Kit. Lots of fun as there are so many different ways to make your own Gin. Just wish I could find more of the bottles online somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: lboz

customer_reviews.title: A Fun Experiment
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun kit. Does it make "real" gin? Probably not but the end product was quite drinkable and fun to make.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The botanicals made the gin taste like licorice. I've adapted the bottles
customer_reviews.text: The botanicals made the gin taste like licorice. I've adapted the bottles, strainer, and funnel to working out my own recipe.
customer_reviews.author: Todd M. Ahlman

customer_reviews.title: High expectations, but falls short
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be more impressive. Sadly, not the case. The gin did not have much flavor and we followed the directions as stated. Perhaps if we do try again we will allow it to steep longer? Not sure if I want to spend the money on it, maybe I can find my own blend and do it that way.
customer_reviews.author: LilSoka

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: The strainer was glued on poorly and came off while hand washing
customer_reviews.author: T6849tw

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My brother loved it! Really well packaged, and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Homemade Gin Kit
customer_reviews.text: It was shipped promptly, well packaged and the gin was EXCELLENT and easy to make. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great packaging - makes a lovely gift for anyone who enjoys gin!
customer_reviews.author: Tara May

customer_reviews.title: loved the kit
customer_reviews.text: loved the kit, wish it had more than one recipe. little to herbal for us so we diluted it.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great gift idea, gin is infused basic spirits, and that is exactly what you make in this kit.
customer_reviews.author: AmandaR

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my brother for Christmas and he LOVED IT! I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Misty W

customer_reviews.title: Fun Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend as a gift. He loves it, very fun.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: It arrived on the day it was supposed to and everything was in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.text: Actually I bought it for my son and he loves it. Has a batch going now. It arrived on the day it was supposed to and everything was in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé loved this. Perfect way to get into cocktail making.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Herring

customer_reviews.title: This looks like a neat
customer_reviews.text: This looks like a neat, cool little kit for something to do and this is NOT a bad review on this product as I haven't tried it. I haven't done anything with mine yet I just wanted to say when I got it the seal on the box was already cut clean with a knife, the cardboard inside was badly damaged so the bottles were clanking together and it came with no invoice. I'm concerned because there is consumables inside of it so make sure to check the package very well before using. Not new condition.
customer_reviews.author: Snake. P.

customer_reviews.title: we did not like the outcome of the gin
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about this gift for my boyfriend. We followed the directions very closely. However, we did not like the outcome of the gin. It taste horrible. It is very perfumy and not at all what I imagined it would be. I do not recommend this for the gin connesurer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Followed the directions exactly but this was the worse tasting gin ever!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, fun, delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This kit is packaged beautifully, and the contents are high quality and very much worth keeping for repeated use. As for the gin? A knock out! Unlike the pine needle gins I've had in the past, this made a spicy, complex, botanical gin that paired phenomenally with ginger ale and muddled berries. It only took 2 months for me to run out an order the refill spices to make another batch. I used Three Olives brand vodka the first time around, at the recommendation that a finer bottle isn't needed and it did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sweet gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a Christmas gift. Fast shipping and was a big hit. Doesn't take long to make and my brother-in-law had fun making his own gin. If you're expecting "top shelf" gin than you will be highly disappointed, but if you're good with regular ole "blue collar" gin, than you should check this out because it's not too shabby. There is a lil bit of an aftertaste, but it's not bad. The bottles that come with the kit are awesome, makes the price tolerable.
customer_reviews.author: KayC Liz

customer_reviews.title: Very pleasant tasting gin
customer_reviews.text: I have a dislike of vodka, personally, so I used a 62%/38% mix of 151 proof Everclear and water instead, to prevent that burning charcoal flavor from a vodka. This yields a 94 proof gin, which is what Bombay Sapphire is. I followed the instructions, and the result is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Psy

customer_reviews.title: Fun set, looks great
customer_reviews.text: Got as a gift for some gin lovers. 3 star rating as they enjoyed it, thought it was a really fun activity to make, and loved the boxed set. They felt like it was potion making and fun to do! Only complaint is they said the gin was very very floral and wasn't quite the taste they like! Of course they didn't expect it to taste like real gin, but the taste was just not for them!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: A tasty and fun project
customer_reviews.text: This was a fun little project to do and it was the perfect gift to give. Some people have written reviews saying they didn't like the flavors, and that's a personal opinion and not a defect of the product. But it can help to try it in different drinks. We've made gin and tonics and martinis and so far we've been pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This makes great gin!
customer_reviews.text: I wondered if this could make good tasting gin from inexpensive vodka. I was pleasantly surprised at the high quality gin I made. It was so good that a friend wanted a taste, then later asked for a second helping. Well worth the money, and it makes a good conversation starter. I will be ordering the refill kit.
customer_reviews.author: PB in Jersey

customer_reviews.title: over priced for what you get
customer_reviews.text: basically paid $40 for botanicals. Did not mention that you needed to buy vodka as well outside of the kit. You can buy botanical alone for much less.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel K.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This was fantastic! However, I like my gin with some citrus so next time I'll add some lemon and lime peel to the mix. I love how you and make it just like they sell it or even add your own flavor to it.
customer_reviews.author: Sony_A230

customer_reviews.title: Fun to make and delicious to drink
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my husband. He made the gin with my son and then used it for gin and tonics. They both said it was fun to make and the gin was the best they ever tasted.
customer_reviews.author: CityGal410

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy!
customer_reviews.text: This was so much fun, we've bought two additional kits as presents. Also bought a decanter...for one bottle instead of two included.
customer_reviews.author: Firefly

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for any Gin lover. Has all you need included and look really impressive.
customer_reviews.author: rlouwho

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift for Dad
customer_reviews.text: It's a little bit pricey for what comes in the box, but it does make a nice gift. The combination of spices/flavors for the gin is delicious! I would love this recipe so I can continue to make more. I got this as a gift for my dad and he enjoyed it, and we love drinking the gin. Everything in the kit is cool looking and exciting for any amateur/beginner home brewer. But this isn't something you're likely to buy more than once, or for someone who knows what they are doing, for even though the kit itself is very cool, it's a bit expensive compared to what you'd pay to buy these supplies on your own.
customer_reviews.author: osarusan

customer_reviews.title: Homemade perfection
customer_reviews.text: Quality items in this kit. Definitely a fair price. Great for someone who is first getting into making homemade gin. Bottles are quite nice - high quality little bottles - great for giving samples of your favorite homemade blends to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Brunelle

customer_reviews.title: Cute gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave it as a gift to gin lovers. They made the gin and just had fun doing it!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: and makes wonderful flavor.
customer_reviews.text: I get this for my boyfriend every year for his birthday. It is a big hit, and makes wonderful flavor.
customer_reviews.author: B.G.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice gift but wish had more supplies for the money.
customer_reviews.author: PV Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for someone who loves to tweek their liquor to their own tastes
customer_reviews.text: Got it for a friend who is a bit of a gin fanatic...she loved making variations on her gins
customer_reviews.author: Everythingwine

customer_reviews.title: Meh... hic.
customer_reviews.text: It was fun (hic). Think I'll stick to my Ten though.
customer_reviews.author: Bob P

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but very strong flavor
customer_reviews.text: I'd soak the berries less time. Has a really strong flavor as directed, almost too strong and I do drink gin, when I drink.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Sidney H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great kit product turned out great the directions were very simple to follow
customer_reviews.author: Luke L.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early and made great gin. Easy to use and delicious product!
customer_reviews.author: travis

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this investment. As I suspected, the instructions would have made an overly herbal (for my taste) gin, so I added the juniper/herb ingredients to 1.75 liters of Luksusowa Potato vodka (my favorite). Even with double the recommended amount of vodka, the flavor was over the top for me. (I prefer Plymouth and Larios gins, taste-wise.) As I can harvest my own juniper berries on-site, I will use the kit to adjust the herb levels -- some of which I also grow. The kit gives me all I need to experiment. (I'm not a chemist, but I am a certified Master Gardener.)
customer_reviews.author: SterlingPhil

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a gin-loving friend as a going-away gift. It was a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Libros1956

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift. The recipient loved it. The packaging inside and out is quality and classy. Very happy with product and pricing.
customer_reviews.author: nineinch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Super cool kit that makes great gin! I used Titos vodka and worked great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I got this for my boyfriend and he loved it - it has inspired him to collect the ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend and he loved it - it has inspired him to collect the botanicals needed to make another batch.
customer_reviews.author: KristiAnne

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff. I turned a 4 dollar bottle of ...
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff. I turned a 4 dollar bottle of vodka into a tasty gin that tasted like it was 50 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: FamilyGameNightForOne

customer_reviews.title: I'm not a conniseur by any means but that stuff is bad. Even my wife who has no taste at ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I don't know who thinks this is a drinkable gin but that's not what I found. I followed directions to the T and even got a decent vodka to start with. Ended up with a ruined bottle of vodka and two small bottles of paint remover. I'm not a conniseur by any means but that stuff is bad. Even my wife who has no taste at all wouldn't take more than a tiny sip. So not waste your money. Go buy a cheap bottle of gin if you want gin.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stein

customer_reviews.title: Great idea.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my best friend who loves gin. Just heard back from him about it. He loved the idea. He loved making the gin. He did not enjoy drinking the gin. So far he has only used it in a martini, but is willing to add a little tonic.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Tuggle

customer_reviews.title: The spices are nice and strong
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad as a father's day gift. He loves it! The spices are nice and strong, and the flavor profile is really unique and pleasant. The glass bottles are very nice, and the packaging is professional and unique. And, aside from that, it's tasty! However, it WONT be tasty if you use crappy alcohol. Do yourself a favor and find a nice smooth vodka (potato vodkas are my favorite) and you'll love this.
customer_reviews.author: ekmumea

customer_reviews.title: He absolutely LOVED this though
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Father and was a bit nervous because he is extremely knowledgeable and picky with his gin. He absolutely LOVED this though! He is ordering him self more refills. He said the taste was delicious. The packaging it self was very well done too so it is great for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Emily L.

customer_reviews.title: Unique and cool gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday gift for my sister and brother-in-law. Was told "you give us the coolest gifts!", that makes this a winner for me. I can see myself getting this for others as a gift as well
customer_reviews.author: cobraquinn

customer_reviews.title: great gift too
customer_reviews.text: why didn't I buy this years ago! great gift too!
customer_reviews.author: RN

customer_reviews.title: Not your run of the mill gifts.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for a gift. It looks nice and I believe the recipient will have fun with it. Just something different for a change.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Sanders-Ferriera

customer_reviews.title: Fun DIY gift
customer_reviews.text: this was so fun! I wish they made replacements for ingredients so we can make some more gin!
customer_reviews.author: sdunbar

customer_reviews.title: Fun to make, Fun to Drink
customer_reviews.text: Great Fun product! This was fun and easy to do. The ending product was a bit strong so we just cut it half and half with of the shelf Gin. The spices were just so strong but tasted great. I am also going to save and reuse all the spices for another batch, maybe add my own cinnamon sticks and the such.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: and he loved it!
customer_reviews.text: i bought this kit as a gift for my boyfriend, and he loved it!
customer_reviews.author: MarciaA

customer_reviews.title: Expensive gag gift
customer_reviews.text: Pricey for a gag gift ... Use the $50 to buy a great bottle of craft gin instead....
customer_reviews.author: Leslee L.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to a Gin loving relative. Not sure of the out come.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Margules

product_meta.title: W&P Design Homemade Gin Kit
product_meta.description: Style Name:Gin KitThe homemade gin kit contains everything you need to transform a generic bottle of vodka into a unique and delicious home-blend of your very own gin.
feature_bullets: PREMIUM INGREDIENTS: Two 375ml glass bottles, a stainless steel strainer, a stainless steel funnel, one tin of juniper berries, and one tin of our botanical spice blend are all you need to create a delicious gin infusion!

THE PERFECT GIFT: A perfect gift for gin-lovers or anyone who can appreciate the art of creating their own unique craft cocktails. Try our smoky botanical spice blend (sold separately) for more delicious creations!

WHAT YOU'LL GET: Each kit includes two 375ml glass bottles, a stainless steel strainer, a stainless steel funnel, one tin of juniper berries, and one tin of our botanical spice blend. Makes 750ml of homemade gin.

FUNCTIONAL & FUN: Great for beginners and professionals alike, the Homemade Gin Kit is easy to use and can turn anyone into an at-home bartender. Each kit makes two bottles, one for you, one for a friend.
Included components: Kit components: two 375ml glass bottles, fine stainless steel strainer, stainless steel Funnel, one tin of Juniper berries, one tin of our secret BOTANICAL blend

ENSURE TOP QUALITY: Amazon is the only authorized seller of W&P Homemade Gin Kits on the site. Your satisfaction is our top concern: to ensure fresh ingredients and a premium experience avoid unauthorized resellers.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars296 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
